title: Mississippi National River & Recreation Area: Asian Carp Documents
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Animals     Asian Carp     Asian Carp Documents                  Asian Carp Documents            Asian Carp Poster (PDF, 749kb)  This single page poster is designed to be printed as a medium to large poster, but may be printed on regular printer paper (8 1/2 x 11 inches) or smaller. Suggested Dimensions: 18 x 24 inches.            Asian Carp Identification Card (PDF, 331kb)  This two-page file is intended to be printed as a double-sided card and folded in half. The first page is the outside graphic, and the second page is the inside graphic. Suggested Dimensions: 3 1/2 x 4 1/2 inches (3 1/2 x 2 1/4 inches when folded).
